attributes.action: Do more to help people in fuel poverty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister recently revealed the governments plans to help people with energy bills. These plans are good for the long term, but what about people who will not be able to heat there homes this winter because of fuel prices. Millions of people will take advantage of the plans to help us with insulation but many people, aspecially O.A.P s and disabled on very low, fixed incomes just do not have the money to pay for fuel. They need help urgently, before winter arrives.
